entity_mention.mention_text: a guy who is part of the on-going occupation of Wall St.
a self made man from the streets like me
a bunch of spoiled kids that want great pay w/o the education or effort it takes to get it
the neocon/teabagger pundits in the media
the copy room of some local city paper
Anyone reading your manic, endlessly repetitive, one-note screeching on this thread alone
